languages.text: {n}Кассия переводит полный боли и сомнений взгляд на вас.{/n} "Быть может, мы не должны лишать ее выбора быть... по-своему свободной?"
{n}Cassia gives you a look full of pain and doubt.{/n} "Perhaps we should not deny her the choice to be... free in her own way?"
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия переводит полный боли и сомнений взгляд на вас.{/n} "Быть может, мы не должны лишать ее выбора быть... по-своему свободной?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia gives you a look full of pain and doubt.{/n} "Perhaps we should not deny her the choice to be... free in her own way?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは苦痛と疑念に満ちた眼差しをあなたに向ける。{/n}「彼女なりの自由な生き方を…尊重してあげるべきはないでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a look full of pain and doubt.{/n} "Perhaps we should not deny her the choice to be... free in her own way?"

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは苦痛と疑念に満ちた眼差しをあなたに向ける。{/n}「彼女なりの自由な生き方を…尊重してあげるべきはないでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅以充满痛苦与怀疑的眼神看着你。{/n}“或许我们不应该剥夺她的选择权，应该允许她……以她自己的方式获得自由？”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a look full of pain and doubt.{/n} "Perhaps we should not deny her the choice to be... free in her own way?"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅以充满痛苦与怀疑的眼神看着你。{/n}“或许我们不应该剥夺她的选择权，应该允许她……以她自己的方式获得自由？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia te lanza una mirada llena de dolor y duda.{/n} «Tal vez no deberíamos arrebatarle la oportunidad de ser... libre a su manera».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a look full of pain and doubt.{/n} "Perhaps we should not deny her the choice to be... free in her own way?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia te lanza una mirada llena de dolor y duda.{/n} «Tal vez no deberíamos arrebatarle la oportunidad de ser... libre a su manera».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia blickt dich voller Schmerz und Zweifel an.{/n} "Vielleicht sollten wir ihr nicht die Wahl nehmen ... auf ihre Weise frei zu sein?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a look full of pain and doubt.{/n} "Perhaps we should not deny her the choice to be... free in her own way?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia blickt dich voller Schmerz und Zweifel an.{/n} "Vielleicht sollten wir ihr nicht die Wahl nehmen ... auf ihre Weise frei zu sein?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia se tourne vers vous, les yeux pleins de doute et de souffrance.{/n} « Peut-être ne devrions-nous pas la priver du choix d'être... libre à sa façon ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a look full of pain and doubt.{/n} "Perhaps we should not deny her the choice to be... free in her own way?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia se tourne vers vous, les yeux pleins de doute et de souffrance.{/n} « Peut-être ne devrions-nous pas la priver du choix d'être... libre à sa façon ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, sana acı ve şüphe dolu bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Acaba... İdira'yı kendi istediği şekilde özgür kalma tercihinden mahrum bırakmasak mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a look full of pain and doubt.{/n} "Perhaps we should not deny her the choice to be... free in her own way?"
